description: This trap is sent when the session ERM connection fails.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerVideoSessionErmConnection CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionErmIndex u 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionRPCServerPort u 9999 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerVideoSessErrorStr s EXAMPLE

description: This is the trap sequence number that increments each
time a trap is sent. It is persistent across resets.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter

description: Severity level of a Cadant trap.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity

description: This is the ERM used for this Virtual Edge.
Multiple VEs may use same ERM.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionErmIndex

description: Contains the local TCP server port value used for ERM sessions.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionRPCServerPort

description: Description of error encountered on the ERM interface.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerVideoSessErrorStr

description: This trap is sent a Session-based input stream never starts.

event.Summary: Session-based input stream has never started, transport Id: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerVideoSessionNoStart CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionErmIndex u 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportId u 9999 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportDestIpAddress s EXAM ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportSrcIpAddress s EXAM ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportDestUdpPort u 9999

description: This is the ERM used for this Virtual Edge.
Multiple VEs may use same ERM.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerErmSessionErmIndex

description: Video session transport identifier.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportId

description: Video session transport destination IP address.
For multicast streams, this is the multicast IP address of the stream.
For unicast streams, this is the IP address of the gigabit Ethernet port where the stream is received.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportDestIpAddress

description: Video session transport source IP address.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportSrcIpAddress

description: Video session transport destination UDP port.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cervSessionTransportDestUdpPort

description: This trap is sent a session-based input stream was being received has failed.

event.Summary: Session-based input stream has failed, transport Id: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-SESSION-MIB::cerVideoSessionMcLinkFail CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

description: This is the trap sequence number that increments each
time a trap is sent. It is persistent across resets.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter

description: Severity level of a Cadant trap.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex
